extendedInfo.description: Find a nearby pharmacy quickly and easily, anywhere in the world!We've got thousands of pharmacies all over the world in this app and near complete coverage throughout England, however we're always on the lookout for more. So if you see a pharmacy and it's not listed then tell us about it! You can do this directly in the app and we'll submit it to the OpenStreetMap project to help other people too, wherever in the world they live - even if they are not using our app. We want this data to be made as widely available as possible!Finding a pharmacy away from home, and in a hurry, can be a difficult and stressful task. Don't get caught out and about needing plasters or nappies, buy it now and be prepared for that next minor emergency without having to hunt around for a chemists.You can search for a pharmacy/chemist around your current location, or look for one in another area (whilst out, or for a distant relative) via a simple place name or postcode search.Find Pharmacies uses the built in GPS to get your current location. If your location cannot be determined automatically then you can always enter your post code to get started. Please note that an internet connection is required to get location and map data.Data reproduced under the terms of the Office of Public Sector Information (OPSI) Click-Use Licence.Our current approximate coverage is as follows:England *****Austria ****Germany ****Luxembourg ***Ireland ***Belgium ***Switzerland ***Finland **Estonia **Belarus **Latvia **France **Czech Republic **Poland **Croatia **Spain **Italy **Georgia **Chile **Norway **Sweden **Portugal **Russia **Romania **Australia **Canada **The Netherlands **New Zealand **Serbia **Greece **Denmark **Ukraine **

reviews.title: Useful but won\'t add new pharmacies
reviews.comment: The app is great as it shows you where the nearest pharmacy is but unfortunately I can\'t add a new pharmacy as the submit button is greyed out and doesn\'t work.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Huge potential ... not yet realised
reviews.comment: A good app - but ... Ads need moving to top of screen. When you select an existing entry, you should be able to see opening times. There needs to be a way editing existing entries. There needs to be a way of reporting duplicate or closed down entries (for the dev to delete - eg all Alliance ones were bought by Boots and rebranded as Boots, yet some now have duplicate entries).
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Agree, screen too crowded
reviews.comment: Ads get in way, results need to be on separate tab/screen when clicked on from map. Good effort though. Change for 5 stars!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: OK but missing tons of pharmacies in my area.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Good app!! Just needs to be easier to submit new locations when you can\'t access internet and gps simultaneously. Other than that cool app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Awsome.best on mkt. It Does what says.brillant. capt.jwf.smith. charing kent england. Thanks.dev. 25.stars
reviews.author: A Google User
